title: Handle Ticket Scanning Failure at Gate
description: A guest's mobile ticket will not scan at the entry gate, showing an 'Invalid Code' error.

tasks.description: Ask the guest for their name or email address to look up their order.
Search the ticketing system for the customer's order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and confirms it is valid for today's event.

tasks.description: Re-issue a new QR code to the guest's email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a new digital ticket to the guest.

tasks.description: Instruct the guest to refresh their email and try scanning the new ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new ticket scans successfully, and the guest is admitted.
